remixlab.dandelion.geom

Interface Linkable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Copyable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mat, Quat, Vec

    public interface Linkable
extends Copyable
    Interface for objects represented from array-data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Linkable get()
      Returns a deep copy of the object.
      float[] get(float[] target)
      Gets data as an array
      void link(float[] src)
      Share the src array data.
      void reset()
      Sets data to default value.
      void set(float[] source)
      Sets representation from the array data
      void set(Linkable source)
      Links array data representation with the source
      void unLink()
      Stop sharing data with the source

      • get

        Linkable get()
        Description copied from interface: Copyable
        Returns a deep copy of the object.

        Typical implementation should simple look like: return new Object(this).
